frontmatter.title: Appearance
frontmatter.description: `Form.Appearance` is a provider for theming form fields.

frontmatter.title: ButtonRow
frontmatter.description: `Form.ButtonRow` is a wrapper for horizontally separated buttons.

frontmatter.title: FieldProps
frontmatter.description: `Form.FieldProps` is a provider for forwarding fields properties, such as `required` or `disabld` to all nested field components.

frontmatter.title: Handler
frontmatter.description: `Form.Handler` provides both the DataContext.Provider and a HTML form element.

frontmatter.title: MainHeading
frontmatter.description: `Form.MainHeading` is a standardized main heading for sections, ensuring default layout, spacing etc.

frontmatter.title: SubHeading
frontmatter.description: `Form.SubHeading` is a standardized sub heading for sections, ensuring default layout, spacing etc.

frontmatter.title: SubmitButton
frontmatter.description: `Form.SubmitButton` connects to the `Form.Handler` to submit the active state of the internal DataContext, triggering `onSubmit`.

frontmatter.title: SubmitIndicator
frontmatter.description: `Form.SubmitIndicator` lets you show an indicator while async form operations are performed.

frontmatter.title: Visibility
frontmatter.description: `Form.Visibility` makes it possible to hide components and elements on the screen based on the dynamic state of data.

frontmatter.title: getData
frontmatter.description: `Form.getData` lets you access your form data outside of the form context.

frontmatter.title: setData
frontmatter.description: `Form.setData` lets you set or modify your form data outside of the form context.

frontmatter.title: useData
frontmatter.description: `Form.useData` lets you access or modify your form data outside of the form context within your application.

frontmatter.title: useError
frontmatter.description: `Form.useError` lets you monitor your form errors outside of the form itself.
